content: **knitted jumper in drops nord or drops alpaca the piece is worked top down with garter stitch and raglan sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #mistylakesweater drops design pattern no-092 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl xxxl **yarn** drops nord from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 450-500-550-600-650-700 g colour 03 pearl grey or use drops alpaca from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 450-500-550-600-650-700 g colour 9020 light pearl grey **needles** drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops circular needle size 2 5 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm drops double pointed needles size 2 5 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need 80 cm circular needle in each size **knitting gauge** 24 stitches in width and 48 row in height with garter stitch on needle size 3 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
